question: What amount of monthly grant was declared by the Uttar Pradesh government to the farmers who will keep stray cattle at their houses?
explanation: Under the "Mukhyamantri Nirashrit Besahara Govansh Sahbhagita Yojana" scheme the Uttar Pradesh government declared to giver Rs. 30 per day (Monthly Rs. 900) to the farmers who will keep stray cattle at their houses. The farmers need to present dairy cards and farmers' cards to avail the facilities of the scheme.
